neg review: Rooms, smell of wet carpets or something

pos review:
Great bed and pillow! I had 2 amazing night sleeping on their bed!
Location is excellent!

pos review: Facility was very nice and well-located. The staff was very helpful and patient.  It was an enjoyable stay.
Location was excellent,  very convenient to attractions. Bed was clean and comfy.  Staff were very good.
neg review: Breakfast was very average and food in the restaurant was unimaginative.

pos review: It was clean & good location, I didn't like the staff behavior they was extremely rude
Was very convenient being able to park there. The room was nice and clean
neg review: Tried to go up to the rooftop bar but the wait was so long. Would be better if the staff let hotel guests have priority over random people coming in

pos review: Great location, friendly helpful staff breakfast fantastic
